website_summaries.verdict: Good price point for human-grade dog treats made with ingredients from American farms.
pros: Uses U.S.D.A.-inspected protein, so you can trust the ingredients are safe
Contains no artificial colors or chemicals
Includes apples and cranberries, which bring antioxidants dogs need for good health
cons: Could use a higher protein percentage

customer_reviews.title: Moldy dog treat warning updated.
customer_reviews.text: Spot Farms Chicken and Apple Sausage dated to expire 11/10/2019 is moldy. My dog normally loves this product, but he is rejecting the moldy product delivered by Amazon in my last monthly shipment. Buyer beware! It appears that product does not meet "human grade" standards touted by the processor. Update 4/3/2018: Only one bag showed up moldy out of six. New deliveries the next month were also mold free. The manufacturer's response was less than stellar however. They pointed out that no preservatives are used in the manufacturing process, but didn't expalin how the product rates a shelf-life of 18 months.
customer_reviews.author: Watch collector 99

customer_reviews.title: Diarrhea Central! AVOID
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and the meatballs- 4 bags of each. My dogs eat EVERYTHING. They have iron guts. The meatballs are 100% fine. These sausage things give them the runs like nothing else, ever. Like, dogs have to sleep outside runs.
customer_reviews.author: ~elf

customer_reviews.title: Great but new order had a changed product size and much higher price
customer_reviews.text: These are made with good ingredients and my dogs like them. Unfortunately with this order they are now sized very thick which make them impossible for my dogs to chew. Not a deal breaker as we can cut them up. My issue is the price increase of $3.15 a bag in one month. Before this order they were $8.99 a bag and now they are $12.14. Probably won't buy again unless the price comes down quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone done!
customer_reviews.text: Burnt and hard treats. I normally purchase these at least once a month but the quality of the brand has gone down. The whole bag of treats are hard like a rock and burnt dark brown disk. Shame on you guys for letting this out of your facility. Quality control...where are you?!?!
customer_reviews.author: Vegan Tasting TX

customer_reviews.title: Malodorous dog treat
customer_reviews.text: The unpleasant odor coming out of the bag was very bad. It is akin to a skunk spraying and definitely put me off. I don’t know if my dog could even eat these without getting sick but I’m not going to chance it. When using human grade food I can understand the shelf life. These dog treats did not appear rotten. But the smell indicated they were. I won’t buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: my chocolate labs poo looks great unlike other expensive all natural brands where they would ...
customer_reviews.text: my dog absolutely loves all of the spot farms treats....we had bought other brands that were all natural and all that but he grew tired of them after a while and wouldnt eat them. there is not 1 spot farms flavor my dog doesnt eat. these are truly healthy treats and the truth is in his poop. my chocolate labs poo looks great unlike other expensive all natural brands where they would get real soft. i highly recommend these treats. you will not be disappointed. the only downside if the price but I dont mind paying for quality products. you get what you pay for...is your dog worth it? mine is.
customer_reviews.author: Pitt

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent quality at times...
customer_reviews.text: Burnt and hard treats, at times. I normally purchase these at least once a month but the quality of the brand has inconsistent. The whole bag of treats are hard like a rock and burnt dark brown disk at times. Quality control issue at the Amazon fulfillment centers (I think) since I don't have the same issue when purchasing them at Petco via a physical site!
customer_reviews.author: JCfromLA

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality - and my dogs adore them!
customer_reviews.text: My picky- eater dog adores these treats! All I have to do is say "do you want a sausage" and he comes running. Some mornings he won't eat his breakfast no matter what we try, but he'll always eat a sausage treat. Our other dog eats anything, but the turkey meatballs are by far her favorite treat. They're soft and can be broken up into smaller pieces, so a bag lasts quite awhile for small dogs. The packaging is also excellent so they don't get stale. I bought these treats from this company because of the high quality ingredients. I've re-orded them probably 6 times. They're totally worth the high price.
customer_reviews.author: LBK

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy With This Order
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been ordering this item for 3 years now and I have to say my last order I wasn’t pleased. The treat seemed to over cooked. Usually this item comes fresh and soft and I can break it in half. This order was dried out and I need to use a knife to cut each treat in half. Not happy, if I get another order like this I will no longer be interested in this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picky Pug loves these
customer_reviews.text: My Pug is actually very picky when it comes to food and treats. However, he is OBSESSED with these treats! So much so, he now refuses to eat his food unless I tear up a treat or two and stick it in his food. He will sit next to his food bowl and not eat until this has been done. So, I recommend this treat for any picky dogs. They do have a slight odor to them, but nothing too awful.
customer_reviews.author: CrimLaw

customer_reviews.title: Bought this product previously without any problem, but...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my last bag in Sept and just recently opened it. My dog has loved these previously. she is a senior and I liked the softness of the product for her, plus the human grade quality. This bag has a best used by date of 5-01-2012, but they are completely hard! I checked the bag over for any holes or tears, but no problem. Don't know what happened with this batch but probably won't order again.
customer_reviews.author: pony girl

customer_reviews.title: My Little Friend "Chesty" Loves These Spot Farm Treats!
customer_reviews.text: I did not try or taste these Spot Farm Treats myself but I must tell you my little "Chesty" loves them!!! And so I will just have to re-order whenever we run low!
customer_reviews.author: MacMan

customer_reviews.title: Sad that the quality and freshness seems to have gone downhill
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these and between Amazon and Chewy we were never without them, but the last two bags we got the treats were all very hard. I have an 11 year old and a 3 year old with only a few teeth and I liked these because they were soft and healthy and my dogs loved them. I tried to break up the hard pieces but my little dog choked, and my older dog seemed to take an awfully long time to get through it, so I don't trust the softness or freshness anymore which is sad, because my two boys really loved these and I felt good about giving them healthy, high value treats.
customer_reviews.author: KatCo

customer_reviews.title: I want an answer , I want to return it !!
customer_reviews.text: I bough spot farm chicken apple sausage 6 package on 10/28/2019, I just open package yesterday, I couldn’t believe what I saw. Sausage are charcoal black and very hard. I bought in past and always light brown color and soft with good flavor. How could they sold this to customers.It’s JUNK !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SPOT CHANGED RECIPE
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these for the last 1 1/2 years an this last order the quality has changed. The company has changed they receipt. The size of the treats too. They're slightly larger. It is my guess they're adding more preservatives to them. They even smell different and the dog won't eat them. That tells you something if the dog doesn't even want to eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My foster fail, Mugsy Malone, loves these treats. He can be picky but with these he runs around in a circle bowing to it and then eating one (or three). I was very impressed to find it on Amazon and for it to arrive so quickly. And the delivery person even used our lockers in my building for packages. Some just prop them up and things go missing. I’ll be reordering these and from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Migdal

customer_reviews.title: almost ready to eat human food
customer_reviews.text: these treats are human grade. Smells and looks like a tasty treat for people. My dogs love them and are a great training tool. Better than the Bilac training treats. They may be a bit more expensive but I cut them in halves and thirds if I am going to train with them, otherwise, I give these out for very good behavior and habits. I would recommend these treats to all dogs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My little dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 Golden Retrievers and a small Pekingese mix rescue - the Goldens will eat pretty much any treat but the little guy is pretty fussy. He loves these! They do look like human grade ingredients and smell really good too. As is the case with most of these high quality treats, they are a little pricey, so I don't give many to the big dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Burnt treats.  Inedible for pets.
customer_reviews.text: Treats look and smell burnt. Pets won’t eat. I have to throw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Made our dog sick!
customer_reviews.text: These looked great, but we will not be buying again! Our dog got super sick after eating but we weren’t sure if these were to blame, we tried again a few weeks later giving him NO other treats and his belly is upset again. These are to blame!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: The dog approves.
customer_reviews.text: Korben loves these treats! He's not much of a "cookie" dog, he much prefers jerky and meaty style treats. These smell like human jerky and he comes running over when I lift up the bag so I'm guessing they taste good. They say human grade but I'd rather not try them, I'll take his word for it. They are a good size also, like a very stick pepperoni slice size. I'd buy these again for him!
customer_reviews.author: SleekNerdlyness

customer_reviews.title: Gave my dog diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: These treats gave my dog diarrhea. Never buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: RottieMama

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as last time
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd time purchasing this treat. This time the treats were so hard I could hardly break them up. My 8 lb older shih tzu cannot break them with her teeth. So I will be returning this package. I will try to order again as they are her favorite treats. I hope this is an exception not the new norm.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Bellon

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs LOVE these
customer_reviews.text: I mean... we haven't personally tasted these for flavor, but it appears that our pups love these! We cut these in half (we have small dogs), and they get one every time they go out and do their business appropriately. They always do their business so they get their treat!
customer_reviews.author: Moonlyn

customer_reviews.title: Even picky Louise will eat these!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 9year old chihuahuas, and one of them is so picky about treats that she has never eaten any I have offered her. Ever! This one finally suited her! She gobbled the first one down, and now can't get enough of them. I can't say enough good about these treats. They smell good, look good, and are apparently exceptional! Thank you for offering them on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rotten!
customer_reviews.text: Completely rotten when I opened the bag!! A year before expiration date
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia R.

customer_reviews.title: They were a little tough
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my rottweiler. She tends to swallow her food without chewing so I hoped a bigger treat would slow her down. NOPE. She still swallowed these whole. I tried breaking/ripping them in half a couple of times and they were a little tough, but the ingredient list was nice.
customer_reviews.author: IWORKALOT

customer_reviews.title: Picky Dog Goes Crazy for These!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pitbull who snubs her nose at cheeseburgers! She wont touch biscuits or other treats, as if they are beneath her, haha. It took me ages to find a few items she actually loves & this is one of them. We still use it for training as your never too old to behave well. She has laser focus when she knows we're about to go into a store or public place, she simply doesn't care about anything or anyone when these are in her line of sight, immediate best behavior. Highly recommended product for the pickiest of furry children!
customer_reviews.author: DecoHarlow

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats and will do anything to have some...I used them during his training with a trainer which is where we were first introduced to them and I still use them to practice his training in home and every day!
customer_reviews.author: Redrocketrider

customer_reviews.title: Good product my dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: Although I can’t attest to flavor my dogs love them. I like the fact it Is human grade without any garbage in them and I set up auto shipments with this product. It’s so nice to have pet companies that care what our four legged family members eat.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Arges

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointed this time.
customer_reviews.text: In the past these sausage style dog treats were soft and chewy, and my dog loved them. Even though the expiration date is until 2022, this bag of treats are so hard I could barely cut them in half with a chef's knife! Time to find a new training treat.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Cook

customer_reviews.title: PICKY DOG LOVES
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a very picky eater. I thought all dogs love all food but he has proven me wrong. I love these treats because you can tear them up into smaller pieces so that they last longer. They smell so good (even I want to eat them)! they are good quality and I like that I know what is in them and where they came from. It is not a weird meat mystery. Anyway, if my dog likes them, you can bet that yours will too
customer_reviews.author: Ml

customer_reviews.title: Smells and tastes delicious
customer_reviews.text: First off, these smell so good, I can see quite a few hoomans mistaking these as a delicious snack. I purchased a bunch of snacks for my long-haired dachshund, very picky eater, he loved these so much I think it changed his taste buds where he couldn't even look at the other snacks. Will be purchasing more of this flavor and from this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Mehani

customer_reviews.title: fresh & smell great
customer_reviews.text: These are my pug's all-time favorite treats. I cut them in half so he feels like he's getting more. I can't just give him one without him begging for another one. They are human grade and they really do smell like a seasoned beef jerky you'd buy at the store. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Suzi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent treat that our dog loves.
customer_reviews.text: We have a very finicky eater and he loves these treats more than anything. Their initial consistency is that of a human chicken/apple sausage (dense, but not hard) and they stay that way for quite awhile (over a month). Eventually they do get hard though so purchase them in reasonable quantities for your dog and then reorder often.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgicaPond

customer_reviews.title: I don't think that dog treats get better than these.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs go insane and this is the one they bark for. They're not a freeze dried meat chip or a chalky dough, they're a moist sausage slice -- anyway, my dogs are really into it. And they made it "human grade" with natural ingredients, so I notice that they are less off putting than most.
customer_reviews.author: sxot

customer_reviews.title: This is not my dog's favorite.
customer_reviews.text: The SPOT FARMS CHICKEN JERKY is wonderful and both my dogs LOVE it. I tried this one and was disappointed. The dogs just turned up their noses and waited for the chicken-jerky kind. Save your money and get the SPOT FARMS CHICKEN JERKY kind! YOUR DOGS WILL THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: margar

customer_reviews.title: Senior dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these treats, and they always seem very fresh. I like them because l’m able to reward him multiple times without giving him multiple calories. Really like this brand, I’ve bought several different treats and flavors from “Full Moon” and they’re always a hit. Go easy integrating these treats(duck meat can be rich) as new foods/treats can upset stomach and give diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: Carson R.

customer_reviews.title: My dog's new favorite treats
customer_reviews.text: These treats are really my pitbull's new favorite. He's very picky about the treats he eats and will turn his nose at most of them. These chicken apple sausages are a huge hit. The bonus is all of the ingredients are human grade and they are made in the USA. My only tiny issue is they stink!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa in Maine

customer_reviews.title: Best snack for my picky eater
customer_reviews.text: Spot Farms is my picky dogs favorite brand and I honestly can’t stray from it any more or else I just waste my money. My dog is very choosy about his snacks and no matter what spot farms treat it is he goes nuts.
customer_reviews.author: AMB1027

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality - dogs love them - healthy ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I love these treats. I restrict using them to training and in the confirmation show ring as they are very high value and the dogs work well for these rewards. I feel good about the quality of these treats, they are not canine junk food and I don’t worry as much about weight gain when using these treats.
customer_reviews.author: C. Openhym

customer_reviews.title: Great Treat
customer_reviews.text: These are the only treats my dog will eat. She loves these things. I keep them for her good behaviors and it works wonders. Thanks for making such a fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen b

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I have it on my monthly subscription. Sometimes it's darker, sometime it's lighter, not sure if it's related to freshness. But my dogs love it, they never have an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Pixel

customer_reviews.title: Pup's favorite treats
customer_reviews.text: Hands down these are my favorite doggy treat brand. My puppy loves every treat that I have given her from Spot Farms. I feel they are a great incentive when training her. I also use them to have her go in her playpen when I'm leaving the house and now she goes automatically, I love that the ingredients are sourced from the USA and made in the USA. A bonus is the high protein content and that it is human grade. I will continue to support this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Edmary

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love these!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs went insane over these treats! I was especially impressed that my mother-in-law's elderly Shepard (who is very picky) absolutely loved them. As a dog owner, it feels great to be confident in the quality of the ingredients I'm giving my dogs. Thank you Spot Farms! We are going to try some of your other products.
customer_reviews.author: marcie griffith

customer_reviews.title: They made my little dog sick
customer_reviews.text: Every time I gave these treats to my maltipoo, she would vomit. I'd break them apart and only give her one or two small pieces. Perhaps a bigger dog would do better with them.
customer_reviews.author: kRusseLl

customer_reviews.title: Big Fans in this house
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs LOVE these treats. We also give our neighboring dogs these when they visit, and they too, love them. They are easy to break into two for small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Clark

customer_reviews.title: Dog Likes
customer_reviews.text: We get the Chicken Apple variety: Our dog has only a few teeth left -- these treats are ones that he likes. Most treats are too hard for him and he drops them back on the floor. These have a soft enough of a texture (sort of like a beef jerky, but a person can pull apart the treat with their fingers), but is not so soft that it falls apart easily (like a piece of bologna does).
customer_reviews.author: Arnett

customer_reviews.title: My pups love these!
customer_reviews.text: Looked for different USA made treats and found these. Very hard to rip into smaller pieces so I cut them. My dogs went nuts for them-and one of them is super picky!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Gave my Aussie Shepard Diarrhea. And yes they smell very bad . I personally would never buy these again for my pups .
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: Smells great to the dog
customer_reviews.text: These are half the price on Amazon when compared to the pet stores. These sausage treats have a strong smell, but they are made from quality ingredients, higher in protein and my dog (plus many at the dog park) love these treats. Great for training
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog votes yes
customer_reviews.text: My sheltie loves these and most all the Spot brand treats. I break them up into smaller pieces (the are scored which makes it easier)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Evenings turn into a circus...
customer_reviews.text: my dogs are willing to do anything for these tasty treats. They can hear the bag across the house and come running. Though they might behave this way with some other snacks, I get to feel good about what I'm feeding them at the same time. win win.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greyhound Worthy
customer_reviews.text: My greyhound is a little on the picky side when it comes to treats. She loves these! I break them up and put them in her Kong whenever I leave the house.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon T.

customer_reviews.title: All my dogs really love these. The don't smell terrible like other treats
customer_reviews.text: All my dogs really love these. The don't smell terrible like other treats, they actually smell good. I bought them due to the minimal ingredient list and that they are human grade. Just a word of caution, if you have a smaller sized dog who likes to swallow their treats whole make sure you break up the treat into smaller pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: My puppy will do anything for these treats!
customer_reviews.text: Always looking for dog treats I can trust not to have questionable ingredients. My Newfoundland loves these and though I can't testify to how they taste, they do smell delicious! I managed to crate train my stubborn puppy in one day with these!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: My dogs absolutely could not wait for them to come in from pottying to get their treats. When I first bought these, I was babysitting a dog who did not like treats however he ate this very happily. They smell wonderful right out of the bag and I was even tempted to try one. So far, all of the Spot Farms products that I have tried have been excellent in both quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L. Walker

customer_reviews.title: picky dog loved them!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very picky Lhasa Apso mix. I've tried many different kinds of treats and haven't found anything she absolutely loves besides beef Bully Sticks...until now. She ate two of these right away and hid the third one in her bed. She also rolled around the floor very happily after eating the first two.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bee

customer_reviews.title: They love it!
customer_reviews.text: I give it to my two little munchkins. They run as soon as they hear the bag open.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona

customer_reviews.title: My pup loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Booker my pup loved them! I was not brave enough to try one but they oddly did small great. Love that I know what each item in the treat is. Great for breaking up one and using as a training treat.
customer_reviews.author: Melyssa M Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Recent batches rock hard and unusable.
customer_reviews.text: These used to be soft and chewey and my terrier loved them. Last two batches have been rock hard and un-eatable. Could not break in half with hands like I used to. Need a strong scissors to cut into pieces, but still too hard for my dog to chew. Returning last batch and will try the turkey meatballs instead.
customer_reviews.author: TAJ

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this stuff I feed it to her for breakfast I started to order this online because the fact I had a very hard time finding it in the pet store the pet store I go to never has it so I end up buying it from her on amazon it is worth the money I will keep on buying it
customer_reviews.author: Capano

customer_reviews.title: My dogs favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the only treats my Terrier doesnt get tired of. They're chewy, smell good, and are made with human grade ingredients, and are her favorite treat. :)
customer_reviews.author: Michell Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Finicky Diva dog's current favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit pricey, but when your dog is a diva and the most finicky eater on the planet, what choice do you have? She's literally shunning our next-door neighbor because he dared to give her a chicken treat after she had already refused his Milk Bones lol.
customer_reviews.author: Jill K Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Healthy human grade treats
customer_reviews.text: I love human grade dog treats! I love these bc I take 2 rounds and cut them into tiny wedges for my fat furface who loves treats but not diets. He's happy he gets " cookies" all day and I'm happy I'm not feeding him garbage.
customer_reviews.author: joann m caban

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product full of natural healthy ingredients. One of my fur babies has allergies and the other epilepsy so I'm very selective about what they eat, and only give them treats that meet my guidelines and restrictions - no dyes or harmful fillers. Thankfully this is one of them.
customer_reviews.author: JLM

customer_reviews.title: Picky poodle loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My toy poodle is very finicky about what he is willing to eat. I've purchased countless treats that he will sniff at and walk away from. However, these he will barely let touch the floor. He gets very excited when I open the bag and that's saying a lot considering how he doesn't even normally come running when you hand him any treat.
customer_reviews.author: Skye Mulligan

customer_reviews.title: great little treats
customer_reviews.text: Beloved by our Danes. About 1" diameter sausage slices, complete with the casing edge. Can be ripped into smaller chuncks if need be, provided you have at least one good thumbnail. Not moist, but not dry.... so your hands and treat bag won't get gross, and you won't be left with crumbles or an overly thirsty pup. (they'll still need a drink, but not live with dry biscuits.)
customer_reviews.author: sarahsam

customer_reviews.title: Made dog sick no refund
customer_reviews.text: This product made my dog really sick. When I tried to return it I got the message that the item is not eligible for refund. I am very disappointed in both the customer service and the quality for such an expensive treat.
customer_reviews.author: PrincessO

customer_reviews.title: Smell delicious but very strongly smoked
customer_reviews.text: Not so sure why but my Dog started itching after just a few treats. He love loves these bit maybe it’s too smoked. Had to put it away not to get tempted to give it to him..
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these and she is a picky eater with a sensitive stomach. They have a strong smell, but it's not unpleasant. They are moist and are easy to tear apart for smaller treats. I get them shipped monthly, they are my go-to treat bag treat.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Penhall Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Im not sure what i got but these are not the spot farm treats i buy at the store. Looks like same bag but the treats are way different. They dont even look like the picture shown. Like black little hockey pucks. Gross.
customer_reviews.author: bigryanwi

customer_reviews.title: Double spins and a Hi Ho Silver from my dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have four small dogs that approve very much of these treats. So much that I had to subscribe for monthly delivery.
customer_reviews.author: keelee

customer_reviews.title: She likes it! She really likes it!
customer_reviews.text: First, the bag is smaller than expected. It’s not cheap. But it’s got quality ingredients, and the dog likes it. The end.
customer_reviews.author: H. Kramer

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves These
customer_reviews.text: My Dog absolutely loves these. Bought them at Christmas time, I give her 2 a day, mornings/evenings. After a month, they are still fresh and smell great. Will absolutely buy these again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Moldy treats.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product forever. It is my dogs favorite. But the last two packages, delivered Dec. 19, were moldy too. Oliver vomited it up. I hope this was a one time thing?
customer_reviews.author: Sandra MacGillivray

customer_reviews.title: Great treats
customer_reviews.text: Love these for treats! They have chicken and real apple bits as well so I feel good about giving my guy these.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your doggie will love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My pug loves them! They’re soft and can be torn into small pieces easily. They don’t smell too great, but my pug likes the smell! I love that they’re made from natural ingredients too :)
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love. Pricey for humans.
customer_reviews.text: My dog really likes these. But they’re a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Elias

customer_reviews.title: This product is horrible.......don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing these for years and now they are horrible. They are thicker and impossible for me to even cut up for my pug. Why change something when it’s working. I also notice from a lot of other reviews that there are allot of other people saying the same thing. I will never purchase these again...
customer_reviews.author: Whitney H.

customer_reviews.title: Happy pup
customer_reviews.text: Our dog LOVES these! They are “puppy crack”! I haven’t tasted them myself but they smell pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot of treats for my dogs and this is one of their favorites. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alinos

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these soft chewy treats!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. I stick 2 in his Kong and he loves it! Good natural ingredients and made in the USA. PetSmart sells but much less expensive on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for training dogs.
customer_reviews.text: My dog ​​loves it, I recommend crunching it in small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Mejias

customer_reviews.title: Great treats
customer_reviews.text: These are my dogs’ favorite treats. They look like human quality food. Definitely works for finicky eaters.
customer_reviews.author: ERG1

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, big hit with my dog
customer_reviews.text: Smell like hell but excellent quality and my dog can’t get enough of them.
customer_reviews.author: Eliana

customer_reviews.title: Good treat
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my very picky dog, who often walks away from treats she dislikes. It's not cheap, but I use it as a nightly treat to get her into her crate, so I can justify the price. She runs to her crate every night in anticipation of this treat, and it's a good night for all!
customer_reviews.author: Musicfiend

customer_reviews.title: Great dog treat and healthy
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. I approve this product and have already bought more.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Great treats for any dog!
customer_reviews.text: Great treats. Only recommendation is that you store your treats in a jar or container that keeps them air tight. If you don’t, they dry out.
customer_reviews.author: BigRed93

customer_reviews.title: Flavor and smell of treat.
customer_reviews.text: My corgi wouldn’t touch these did not even like the smell of them.
customer_reviews.author: teresa gail crosby

customer_reviews.title: These are a good healthy treat for dogs and my dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: These are a good healthy treat for dogs and my dog loves it
customer_reviews.author: lindyrumsey

customer_reviews.title: No allergens that affect our Chewy.
customer_reviews.text: Tried them, they taste great. Our Shi'tzu likes them too. A bit spendy, worth it though, to have her not itch all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Great for picky eaters!
customer_reviews.text: These are my dog’s absolute favorite treats! Out of all the many treats I’ve bought her, these are her favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have not explored the 'human' testing aspect but I do like the fact that these treats do seem to be ...
customer_reviews.text: My Airedale loves these treats- and the other Spot Farm flavors. I have not explored the 'human' testing aspect but I do like the fact that these treats do seem to be pet friendly and are made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: You Can Smell The Sausage!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog and his friend beg for more. The treat must be delicious!!! Shipped quickly!!! Will buy again!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paula E. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Smell like sausage
customer_reviews.text: That my dog liked them for a change. She is very particular what snacks she’ll eat.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby H.

customer_reviews.title: Last bag wasn't up to standards
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this product many times before. This bag the treats were very rubbery and hard to break into small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: barnbum

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: They smell so good. Both dogs go crazy for them. They are not oily like a human sausage or hot dog is, so they are perfect for treat pouches and way less messy.
customer_reviews.author: John Bannon

customer_reviews.title: Dog approved
customer_reviews.text: Dog and cats get excited when they hear the bag open
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love but orders are not always of fresh bags.
customer_reviews.text: Dogs favorite treat. We feel good about feeding them these treats but the bags have been hit or miss in freshness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Spot Farms All Natural Human Grade Dog Treats, Chicken Apple Sausage
product_meta.description: Size:12.5 OunceSpot Farms believes the benefits associated with farm to fork accountability shouldn’t just be reserved for humans, our pets deserve the best too! That’s why Spot Farms uses only the finest ingredients sourced from family farms and trusted suppliers here in the United States. Our Chicken Apple Sausage contains nutritious, human grade ingredients like high-fiber brown rice and antioxidant-rich apples, all with a real meat flavor your dog will love!
feature_bullets: Human Grade, No Antbiotics Ever Dog Treats Made In The Usa
Made With Real, Antioxidant Rich Apples
Soft & Chewy, Bite Size Treats, Great For Small Dogs
All Natural, No Artificial Flavors, Preservatives, Or Colors

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
